concept.title: Luggage compartment
concept.shortdesc: The luggage compartment provides a secure storage area for stowing packages.

conbody.p: The luggage compartment is located at the rear of the vehicle.
Open the luggage compartment by turning the handle anti-clockwise to release the catch. Turn the handle clockwise to secure the compartment. When closed, you can lock the lid with the key provided.

fig.title: Locking the lid of the luggage compartment

conbody.p: Fold the lid down and use it in the open position for additional luggage carrying capacity. The rear number plate is hinged so that you can ensure it is clearly visible to following vehicles when the luggage compartment lid is folded down.Don't carry heavy luggage items on the lid.
